purpose: To provide an efficient way to transform JSON data into various schemas, enabling developers to integrate and manipulate data seamlessly.
principle: Utilizes AI algorithms to intelligently map and convert JSON structures, ensuring accuracy and adherence to specified schemas.
reusability: Designed to be modular and adaptable, allowing users to easily apply the tool across different projects and data formats.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may result in incomplete features and potential bugs. Performance may vary based on complex schemas.
name: Jaiqu
description: Automatically reformat any JSON into any schema with AI
